thread.title: The Charlotte Gainsbourg for Nars Collection Is Coming and Here’s Everything We Know About It
thread.title_full: The Charlotte Gainsbourg for Nars Collection Is Coming and Here’s Everything We Know About It

title: The Charlotte Gainsbourg for Nars Collection Is Coming and Here’s Everything We Know About It
text: January 13, 2017 Getty Images Nars is one of the biggest beauty brands in the world—its Orgasm blush has been an Allure Best of Beauty winner for nearly 15 years. So when we heard about the Charlotte Gainsbourg for Nars Collection we had to share the news—even though details are pretty scarce at this point. According to Refinery 29 , the new collection, which launches this spring, includes 18 brand-new, limited-edition products for eyes, lips, and cheeks. Plus, rumor has it that one of the products will be totally new—as in, something Nars has never offered before. Related Makeup Instagram-Favorite BH Cosmetics Is Now Available at Target The buzzworthy new collection was created in collaboration with British-French actress Charlotte Gainsbourg , who will also star in the brand’s summer 2017 campaign. The company’s founder and creative director, François Nars , told Refinery 29 he’d been hoping to work with Gainsbourg since meeting her on a shoot two years ago. “She’s an incredibly charming and giving person with an instinctive taste and style. I admire her for building a career with no compromise, no limits, and totally dedicating herself to it,” Nars said of the international "It" girl. Gainsbourg (whose mother is former Hermès muse Jane Birkin), shared similar sentiments about her collaborator. “It was very familiar working with [Francois Nars]—as if we’d known each other for a long time,” she told Refinery 29 . Since Gainsbourg was directly involved in the design process, you can expect to see products that reflect her personal beauty style—think summery blushes and dramatic, smokey shadows. The Charlotte Gainsbourg for Nars Collection launches at Nars boutiques on April 15 and Sephora stores nationwide May 1. We can’t share any more details quite yet, so stay tuned: We’ll update the moment we can. More beauty collaborations you don't want to miss:
